school: Johns Hopkins University Whiting School of Engineering
program: Master of Science in Engineering Management (MSEM)

sections.text: The MSEM program blends advanced technical coursework with management education to prepare engineers for leadership roles in technologyâ€‘driven organizations.
The curriculum integrates engineering depth with business courses, including finance, marketing, and project management, plus leadership training and applied projects.
Applicants must hold a relevant technical background; the program requires completion of approved coursework and practical leadership experiences.
Graduates assume leadership and management roles in engineering, R&D, consulting, and technology enterprises.
